
---
title: "getDecrypt"
title_tag: "vault.transit.getDecrypt"
meta_desc: "Documentation for the vault.transit.getDecrypt function with examples, input properties, output properties, and supporting types."
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

This is a data source which can be used to decrypt ciphertext using a Vault Transit key.


{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Vault = Pulumi.Vault;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var test = Output.Create(Vault.Transit.GetDecrypt.InvokeAsync(new Vault.Transit.GetDecryptArgs
        {
            Backend = "transit",
            Ciphertext = "vault:v1:S3GtnJ5GUNCWV+/pdL9+g1Feu/nzAv+RlmTmE91Tu0rBkeIU8MEb2nSspC/1IQ==",
            Key = "test",
        }));
    }

}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vault/sdk/v4/go/vault/transit"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := transit.GetDecrypt(ctx, &transit.GetDecryptArgs{
			Backend:    "transit",
			Ciphertext: "vault:v1:S3GtnJ5GUNCWV+/pdL9+g1Feu/nzAv+RlmTmE91Tu0rBkeIU8MEb2nSspC/1IQ==",
			Key:        "test",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example python >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_vault as vault

test = vault.transit.get_decrypt(backend="transit",
    ciphertext="vault:v1:S3GtnJ5GUNCWV+/pdL9+g1Feu/nzAv+RlmTmE91Tu0rBkeIU8MEb2nSspC/1IQ==",
    key="test")
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as vault from "@pulumi/vault";

const test = pulumi.output(vault.transit.getDecrypt({
    backend: "transit",
    ciphertext: "vault:v1:S3GtnJ5GUNCWV+/pdL9+g1Feu/nzAv+RlmTmE91Tu0rBkeIU8MEb2nSspC/1IQ==",
    key: "test",
}, { async: true }));
```


{{< /example >}}
